entry.title: Ukraine Braces for Intense Battles in Eastern Donbas
entry.content: Ukraine urged civilians to leave the eastern Donetsk, Luhansk and parts of the Kharkiv regions as it prepared for a major new Russian offensive following Moscowâ€™s withdrawal from the north of the country.

entry.title: 'We Will Kill You': How Russia Silenced Its Antiwar Movement
entry.content: A new Russian law prohibiting referrals to the military campaign in Ukraine as a war or an invasion and mass arrests of protesters have largely eliminated visible signs of dissent inside Russia, leading to large numbers of people choosing to leave the country.
